title: Popilush Lace Corset Dress with Built in Shapewear Cocktail Dresses for Women Deep V Neck Formal Midi Dress Side Slit
description: Size Notice and Washing Tips: This lace cocktail dresses for women runs small and has limited stretch, creating slimmer curves. Please follow our size chart and measure your bust, waist and hip. Choose the appropriate size to get more comfortable fit. If you want a looser fit, PLEASE SIZE UP. To keep our shapewear dress in the good condition, we recommend hand-washing with no ironing and no bleaching

Lace-adorned with Gold Stamping: This corset dress is made of stretch floral lace fabric and compression mesh lining, designed to provide both comfort and shaping. The lace part of this shapewear dress is not the traditional lace design, but lace with gold stamping print. More noble, elegant and charming

Unique Tech for Tummy Control and Body Shaping: This lace corset dress is not just your regular outfit, it is also a built in shapewear dress crafted with exclusive shaping and fabric technology. Designed for women, this shaper dress tightens your core, lifts your bust, smooths your abdomen, and enhances your buttocks, accentuating your curves effortlessly. Plus, this formal cocktail dress is the ideal choice for exuding confidence, allure, and a fashionable vibe

Corset style, Side Slit and V-neck Design: This corset-style fall midi dress is adorned with slimming lines that visually cinch the waist, flatten the tummy, and create a slimmer appearance. The side slit showcases your leg contours while providing you with more room to move freely. The V-neck design of this formal cocktail dress accentuates the attractive chest and neckline. Adjustable shoulder straps offer you a comfortable wearing experience

Every Girl's Must-have Detail: We have meticulously designed every aspect of this lace corset dress. The built-in underwire provides better breast support, laser-cut foot openings minimize visible wear marks, and the overlapping crotch design offers convenience during restroom breaks. Made with cotton-infused fabric on the crotch, no need to wear underwear, this bodycon midi dress ensures breathability and comfort, allowing you to stay cool and relaxed
